DOC.brief_summary: The Mobile Diabetes Intervention Study trial evaluate diabetes coach system , use mobile phone patient/ physician internet portal allow patient-specific treatment communication primary care physician . We hypothesize timely information provide patient physician result reduction A1c 1 year .
